posts.post_content: FS this B18 blanket of Ty Cobb - these were inserted in an envelope attached to packages of Egyptienne Straight Cigarettes in 1914. Great example of this felt with solid borders, white infield (uniform toning) green base paths. $358 OBO shipped (pp gift, MO, check OK).

I've never collected that issue ... looks neat though.  For those ignorant, like myself, could you please provide the scoop.... e.g. size, materials, etc.

Best,
Scott
Check out the Cobb blanket in B&L auction lot 128 tonight - I will sell mine for $50 less than the hammer price of that one (excluding buyer premium). Free shipping.
Lot 128 at B&L went for $499 last night + reasonable shipping. You can this very nice example for $358.
One more bump for this great deal
